title:
Buttermilk Pancakes Recipe courtesy Elizabeth Gilroy, 2 cups buttermilk
1 cup flour
1 egg
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt In small mixing bowl, combine all of the ingredients and mix well. Pour by spoonfuls onto a hot, oiled griddle. Spread the batter with the back of the spoon to make thin, crepe-like pancakes. Cook until the batter is bubbly. Turn over. Serve immediately with butter and syrup or favorite fruit sauce. Yield: 4 servings
Prep Time: 10 minutes
Cook Time: 15 minutes
Difficulty: Easy
